alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 06 at 11:20AM PST until December 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Del Norte County and northern Humboldt including Humboldt Bay. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Increased risk of rock and mudslides on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 0.7 to 1.3 inches of rain have already fallen. An additional 1 to 2.5 inches of of rain are expected through this evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
